parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the serpentine belt can cause loss of power steering, leading to reduced vehicle control and increased risk of accidents, especially in wet road conditions.
symptoms: The serpentine belt comes off while driving
often in light rain or when driving through shallow puddles
resulting in loss of power steering and potentially causing a severe wreck.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Component Failure (Valve Guide, Timing Chain, and Head Gasket)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of engine components such as valve guides, timing chains, and head gaskets can cause engine damage, leading to costly repairs, reduced vehicle performance, and potentially causing a breakdown or accident.
symptoms: Engine problems
including valve guide failure
timing chain failure
and head gasket failure
resulting in engine damage and potentially causing a breakdown or accident.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat belt retractor can lead to inadequate restraint of the occupant, increasing the risk of injury or fatality in the event of a crash.
symptoms: The seat belt does not lock or retract properly
the seat belt does not tighten or catch during sudden stops or crashes
the occupant is not properly restrained
leading to injuries or fatalities.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the door lock system can cause inconvenience, compromise vehicle security, and potentially lead to accidents or injuries if doors open unexpectedly while driving.
symptoms: Door locks do not function
doors will not latch
door handles will not open from the inside
door handles will open from the outside but not from the inside.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission failure can cause the vehicle to lose power, hesitate, or stall, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The transmission slips or hesitates
the transmission makes unusual noises
the transmission warning light illuminates
the vehicle loses power or acceleration
the vehicle stalls or shuts down.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission mount failure can cause excessive vibration, noise, and damage to surrounding components, leading to premature wear and potential transmission failure.
symptoms: Excessive vibration felt through the seat
floor
or steering wheel
unusual noises from the transmission area
visible signs of wear or damage to the transmission mount.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the front rotors can cause loss of braking power, leading to increased stopping distances, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Sudden loud grinding or screeching noise when braking
vibrations through the steering wheel or brake pedal
visible cracks or breaks in the rotor surface
reduced braking performance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake calipers can cause a loss of braking power, leading to increased stopping distances, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Smoke or odor from the brakes
spongy or soft brake pedal
reduced braking performance
visible signs of brake fluid leakage
abnormal brake noise.
